parameter.name: userName
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: This is the user name for logging in into the gateway. Default is "admin"

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: This is the password for logging in into the gateway. Default is "0000"

parameter.name: gatewayAddress
parameter.label: Gateway IP Address
parameter.description: This is the IP address of the gateway (e.g. 192.168.0.15). It should get auto discovered.

parameter.name: gatewayId
parameter.label: Gateway ID
parameter.description: This is the id of the gateway (e.g. 5410EC036151). It is the MAC address of the gateway without separator char ":", It should get auto discovered.

parameter.name: readTimeout
parameter.label: Read Timeout (optional)
parameter.description: This is the timeout in ms for reading answer from the gateway. The default is 2000ms (2s) which should be ok for most installations.

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval (optional). Default is 30 (seconds).
parameter.description: This is the interval in seconds for polling the status of the bisecure device. Each time the bisecure gateway will send a wireless request to the device to query the state.

parameter.name: activePollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval during working (optional). Default is 5 (seconds)
parameter.description: This is the interval in seconds for polling the status of the bisecure device while it is working (open or closing). Each time the bisecure gateway will send a wireless request to the device to query the state.

parameter.name: activePollingTimeout
parameter.label: Time after which active polling is stopped (optional). Default is 300 (seconds)
parameter.description: This is the time in seconds after which the active polling (see activePollingInterval) is stopped. Should be more how long your door needs to open or close.

parameter.name: activePollingDuringOpened
parameter.label: Should we stay in active polling mode while the door is open? (optional). Default is false.
parameter.description: Normally the status updates are not very frequent to safe wireless calls. But to have a quite fast reaction, you can have the activePolling active while the door is open.

thing-type.label: BiSecure Group
thing-type.description: A group of devices connected to the BiSecure Gateway (e.g. a garage with one door)
